page.title: 01 THE AREA I LIVE IN
page.content: 'm eleven years old and was born in Dartord, I've lived in Dartford all my life, near the heath which is on the edge of the town. I like my town because it has a very large new theatre called The Orchard,a park with a new play area, a swimming pool called Fairfield Pools which also have squash courts and other such sports,a libary with its very own museum that has lots of information on the history of Dartford. It has its own shopping centre named the Arndale Centre soon to be renamed the Priory Centre. The Arndale was opened in November 1975. Dartford has its own tunnel which is named after it ,which crosses the river Thames to Essex. We are only a short train ride to London and situated on the edge of the Greater London Area. The population in Dartford is 42,000.
